results.title: Galician vermouths, wines and spirits - Bodegas Lodeiros
results.content: # Bodegas Lodeiros: Galician vermouths, wines and spirits with tradition. In each of our Galician vermouths, wines and liqueurs you will find aromas of the Atlantic, our tradition and our culture. Our Galician vermouths, made from white wine produced by ourselves in our winery, are the result of the fusion between Galician tradition and sustainable innovation. ## The Galician wines of Bodegas Lodeiros. ## The Lodeiros Winery Natural Way. At Bodegas Lodeiros, we are committed to sustainable production that respects the environment and promotes biodiversity.
